title: Features | Splits Network
description: Explore the complete Splits Network platform — role marketplace, ATS, AI matching, messaging, analytics, and automated billing. Every tool for split-fee recruiting in one place.
author: Splits Network

blocks.subtitle: From role posting to placement payout, Splits Network provides the complete infrastructure for split-fee recruiting. One platform, every workflow.
blocks.imageAlt: Recruiter navigating Splits Network dashboard across multiple feature panels

blocks.heading: Built for the Full Recruiting Cycle
paragraphs: Most recruiting tools solve one problem. An ATS manages candidates. A job board surfaces roles. A payment processor handles fees. Splits Network connects all of it — a single platform where the marketplace, pipeline management, messaging, and billing work together without stitching together separate tools.

Every feature is designed around the split-fee model. That means role visibility is structured for multi-recruiter engagement, pipelines are shared across parties with clear permissions, and payments trigger automatically when verified outcomes occur.

items.title: Role Marketplace
items.description: Browse hundreds of verified open roles. Filter by specialty, location, fee structure, and company type to find the best fit for your candidate pool.

items.title: Smart Alerts
items.description: Set preferences once. Get notified when roles matching your recruiting niche are posted. Engage before the competition.

items.title: Verified Companies
items.description: Every company on the platform passes verification before posting. No ghost jobs, no unresponsive hiring managers.

items.title: Split Agreements
items.description: Fee splits are displayed before engagement. Agree to terms once, and they're locked in for the duration of the placement.

items.title: Real-Time Activity
items.description: See which recruiters are engaged on a role, how many candidates have been submitted, and where each stands in the pipeline.

items.title: Fee Transparency
items.description: Total placement fee, split percentages, and payout timelines are displayed clearly on every role card.

blocks.heading: A Purpose-Built ATS
paragraphs: Splits Network includes a native applicant tracking system designed specifically for collaborative recruiting. Unlike standalone ATS tools grafted onto a job board, ours is built from the ground up for split-fee workflows.

items.title: Shared Pipelines
items.description: Candidates move through stages visible to all authorized parties — company, job-posting recruiter, and placing recruiter.

items.title: Customizable Stages
items.description: Build hiring workflows that reflect how you actually hire. Unlimited stages, drag-and-drop configuration.

items.title: Role-Based Access
items.description: Hiring managers see what they need. Recruiters see their submissions. Sensitive data stays controlled.

blocks.imageAlt: Candidate pipeline view with multiple hiring stages and status indicators

items.title: AI Candidate Matching
items.description: The platform evaluates candidate profiles against role requirements and surfaces the strongest fits first. Match scores are transparent and explainable — not a black box.

items.title: Role Recommendations
items.description: Recruiters receive personalized role recommendations based on their placement history, active candidate pool, and specialty areas.

items.title: Resume Parsing
items.description: Structured data extraction from uploaded resumes. Skills, experience, and credentials are indexed automatically for search and matching.

items.title: Predictive Analytics
items.description: Time-to-fill forecasting, placement probability scores, and revenue projections based on your active pipeline.

blocks.quote: We replaced three separate tools with Splits Network. The ATS, the marketplace, and billing are now one workflow. Our team closes roles 40% faster.
blocks.citation: Marcus Chen, Director of Recruiting Operations

items.title: Direct Messaging
items.description: Threaded conversations between recruiters, hiring managers, and candidates. All communication stays on-platform and tied to the relevant role.

items.title: Automated Billing
items.description: Placement fees are calculated and invoiced automatically when a hire is confirmed. No manual billing, no chasing payments.

items.title: Stripe Payouts
items.description: Recruiter earnings are paid via Stripe on a fixed cadence after the guarantee period. Track every pending and completed payout in your dashboard.

items.title: Interview Scheduling
items.description: Coordinate interview availability between recruiters and hiring teams without leaving the platform.

items.title: Performance Analytics
items.description: Track placement rates, time-to-fill, earnings per role, and pipeline health across all your active engagements.

items.title: Candidate Database
items.description: Your candidate network follows you across every role. Build relationships, track interactions, and re-engage past candidates efficiently.

items.question: Does Splits Network replace my existing ATS?
items.answer: For most split-fee workflows, yes. The built-in ATS handles candidate tracking across all roles with full pipeline visibility. If your organization uses an enterprise ATS, we support integrations via our API and partner connections.

items.question: How does AI matching work?
items.answer: Our matching engine evaluates candidates against role requirements across structured skills, experience depth, location, and compensation expectations. Match scores are displayed as percentages with a breakdown by category — you always know why a candidate ranks where they do.

items.question: Are there limits on messaging or candidate submissions?
items.answer: Starter plan includes generous monthly limits. Pro and Enterprise plans have unlimited submissions and messaging. All plans have visibility into their current usage in the dashboard.

items.question: Which features are available on the free plan?
items.answer: The Starter plan includes full marketplace access, candidate submissions, direct messaging, and basic pipeline management. AI matching, advanced analytics, and custom ATS stages are available on paid plans.
